    • allelic_imbalance
    • allelic_variance
    • dynamic_allelic_changes

    Fits a local regression model with dispersion as a function of total gene counts. Predicted values are the expected dispersion for genes with similar expression levels The initial dispersion estimates are shrunk towards the common dispersion

    correct_theta_bygroup.Rd

    Fits a local regression model with dispersion as a function of total gene counts. Predicted values are the expected dispersion for genes with similar expression levels The initial dispersion estimates are shrunk towards the common dispersion

    correct_theta_bygroup(
  estimates,
  delta_set = 50,
  N_set = 30,
  thetaFilter = NULL
)

    Arguments

    estimates

    Output of estim_bbparams_bygroup

    delta_set

    Delta parameter

    N_set

    N parameter

    thetaFilter

    Minimum dispersion value, genes with dispersion below the set threshold are excluded from the shrinking procedure.

    Examples

    correct_theta()
#> Error in eval(assertion, env): argument "estimates" is missing, with no default

    Contents

    Developed by Veronika Petrova, Emily Wong.
